nodes.text: Star Wars 2: In the Shadow of Yavin, Part Two is the second issue in the Star Wars comic book series. The series takes place between Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, two months after the Battle of Yavin. It was released on February 13. 2013.
A cagey young Imperial officer seems to anticipate the Rebels' every move, so Princess Leia forms a “stealth squadron”—including Luke Skywalker—to expose a suspected spy within their ranks.

Meanwhile, Han Solo and Chewbacca run afoul of bounty hunter Boba Fett, and the Emperor sends Darth Vader on a secret mission! Stars Han Solo, Princess Leia, Luke Skywalker, and Darth Vader! Set during classic trilogy events!
